Hà Nội.description: Hà Nội, the capital of Vietnam, is known for its centuries-old architecture and rich culture.

Ho Chi Minh City.description: A bustling metropolis that blends historical landmarks with modern skyscrapers.

Da Nang.description: Known for its sandy beaches and history as a French colonial port.

Hue.description: The imperial capital, home to ancient palaces and tombs.
